location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has obscured the body of the letter towards the end of f. 73v. As a result, the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement and reply to a communication dated 25 October 1807. It concerns a dispute over the expenses and allowances due to the Resident at Bushire, which the Resident believes are not adequate for their stated purpose.
